name: BetterMe | by StarMeUp OS
description: Boost employee development through 360 feedback.  Our 360 feedback app allows any member of an organization to receive or ask for an evaluation to their coworkers at any moment.  With BetterMe you will be able to:  * Send and receive feedback fast and efficiently. * Encourage constructive evaluation regardless of the role. * Promote employee development and motivation. * Identify strengths and opportunities for continuous improvement.  We are constantly working to add new functionalities to make BetterMe the best 360 feedback app on the market. Keep your updates on to ensure you dont miss any upgrades.  Get in touch with us to start a digital transformation in your company!
